about_the_game:
In this goofy horror shooter, you play as a cop who has received a 911 call from banana people claiming that they need to be rescued out of a slaughter house that is being run by pigs. It is your duty to free the bananas from slaughter and to eliminate any pigs that stand in your way.

Synopsis:

On one particular night, a 911 operator receives a call from an anxious banana who claims that him and his fellow banana folks are being slaughtered in a slaughterhouse known as: "Miss Daisy Butchery Inc." and they are being sold as food to for pigs to consume.

The operator sends over (you the player) a handsome and brave police officer to liberate the bananas from mass slaughter. But watch out, the vicious and hungry pigs will munch you down if you don't protect yourself with your best friend, a pump action shotgun!

Banana massacre is a goofy, thrilling and spooky survival horror experience which will absolutely knock your socks off!

Features:

  • Weapon combat: You ain't afraid of no pig. Use your shotgun to blow up these fools.

  • Cute Graphics: lots of cute models of bananas, pigs and other props to give players the

    oomph that they need.

  • Resource management : Use your health kits and ammo wisely for your best chance of surviving from these viscous pigs.  

  • Hungry hungry pigs: You will be shocked when pigs will poof right Infront of you, so you better react fast and hard.

  • Real Horror: Banana massacre's setting and characters are inspired by real life events making this one of the most disturbing games ever made (for legal reasons this is a joke)

So? Do you have what it takes to liberate the banana species from mass slaughter?

oink oink

content_descriptors.notes: Use of guns, cartoonish violence and blood.

name: Banana Massacre

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this goofy horror shooter, you play as a cop who has received a 911 call from banana people claiming that they need to be rescued out of a slaughter house that is being run by pigs. It is your duty to free the bananas from slaughter and to eliminate any pigs that stand in your way.
